settings.label: CONTACT
settings.title: GET IN TOUCH
settings.description: Got questions about our gear? Need tech support? Want to join a pro team sponsorship? Hit us up.

settings.question: Is your gear compatible with PS5/Xbox?
settings.answer: Most of our peripherals are cross-platform compatible. Each product page lists specific platform support. Our wireless products work seamlessly with PC, PlayStation, and Xbox via our universal receiver or Bluetooth.

settings.question: How do I apply for team sponsorship?
settings.answer: We're always looking for talented teams and content creators. Fill out our sponsorship form with your team info, tournament history, and content links. We review applications monthly.

settings.question: What's your warranty policy?
settings.answer: All products include a 2-year manufacturer warranty covering defects in materials and workmanship. For mechanical keyboards, switches are covered for 50 million actuations. We've got your back.

settings.question: Do you offer software for customization?
settings.answer: Yes! Our free software suite lets you customize RGB lighting, create macros, adjust DPI settings, and sync effects across all compatible devices. Available for Windows and macOS.
